DOC.brief_summary: The purpose proof concept study find efficacy Marealis Refined Peptide Concentrate ( RPC ) Coldwater Shrimp ( Pandalus borealis ) contain ACE-inhibiting peptide blood pressure subject mild moderate hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Antihypertensive Effect Safety Peptides Derived From Coldwater Shrimp
DOC.criteria: mild moderate hypertension ( systolic blood pressure 130 160 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≤ 100 mmHg ) age 30 75 year body weight ≥ 60 kg stable body weight use effective contraception woman childbearing potential body mass index ≥ 35 antihypertensive drug treatment , regular high dose NSAID treatment use cyclosporine tacrolimus diabetes ( type 1 2 ) anemia , abnormal electrolyte , proteinuria , abnormal liver , kidney thyroid function , clinically significant biochemistry , clinically significant hematology and/or biochemistry investigator 's discretion cardiovascular disease ( myocardial infarction , unstable angina pectoris , coronary artery bypass graft , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty , temporal ischemic attack within six month prior screen ) include stroke congestive heart failure secondary hypertension history cancer malignant disease within past five year metabolic disease , gastrointestinal disorder clinically significant disease/disorder investigator 's opinion could interfere result study safety subject fish seafood allergy , citrus allergy , multiple food allergy alcohol abuse smoker tobacco/snuff/nicotine user consumption food supplement target blood pressure lower within 30 day randomization pregnant lactating mother , woman , plan pregnancy study participation clinical trial 30 day prior study participation clinical intervention
